jobInfo.postDescription:
Overview

We are looking for a software quality engineer with Chemical Engineering, Automation, Process Control, Engineering or related background.

Your Impact
Be part of the software quality team, proactively and closely work with Shanghai, US and Mexico City team to complete assignments;
Design and execute manual / automated test cases to ensure testing coverage and product quality;
Understand customer’s requirements, be creative in identifying product defects and collaborate with developers to track defects until closure.

工作职责
运用化工或其他相关专业背景知识，按时完成各种AspenTech公司软件的测试任务；
测试的软件包括各类化工流程模拟软件（Aspen Plus、HYSYS）、先进过程控制软件，供应链优化软件，制造生产过程执行系统软件等；
作为团队成员，在测试经理和高级测试工程师的管理指导下，共同完成与上海、美国及墨西哥团队的合作；
设计和执行手动/自动测试用例，以确保软件产品质量；
积极发现软件缺陷，并与开发人员合作以追踪缺陷并验证修复结果。

What You’ll Need
0-2 years’ working experience in software industry, fresh graduates are welcomed to apply;
Bachelor or above degree in Chemical Engineering, Automation, Process Control, Engineering or related majors;
Good spoken and written English skill;
Good communication skills and a good team player;
Experience with AspenTech software or related is a plus;
Experience with software testing is a plus.

招聘要求
0-2年工作经验，欢迎优秀应届毕业生加入；
拥有化学工程与工艺、自动化或控制理论与控制工程、或各相关专业本科及以上学历；
良好的英语听说读写能力；
良好的沟通能力和团队合作能力；
有使用化工行业软件或过程控制的经验优先；
具有软件测试经验优先。
职位关键词

化工，化工软件，化工软件测试，化工工程师，化学工程，控制工程，ASPEN PLUS，HYSYS

AspenTech is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected Veteran Status or any other basis protected by federal, state, or local law.
jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区惠生大厦B栋中科路699号
